channel.title: PvP client?
channel.description: Anyone know of a good pvp client? Also, some sort of macro to help with switching to r2h?

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @BAsh BAsh
item.description:
@BAsh wrote:

Additionally the HP value is not valid unless the HP bar is displayed. As such it gives you no advantage unless you aggregate it with an estimate of max HP.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

[quote=“Miss Silabsoft, post:24, topic:301865”][quote author=Original Daniel link=topic=398193.msg2958692#msg2958692 date=1253018046]
Only useful things I can think of would be damage predictor (you get the hp exp before the hit shows) and overhead hp on your opponent.
[/quote]
so why would you want to waste the time of seeing the damage you are going to do a fraction of a second before the client actually displays the damage you have delt?[/quote]

For range 2h - if you know a fraction of a second earlier that you will hit high then you can combo on the same hit.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @cooper cooper
item.description:
@cooper wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:25, topic:301865”]Off topic but whatever: The first time I used Moparscape Revolution it worked wonders, I pk’ed full addy, I tried to pick it up, and the client froze up and I missed the drop -.-

To sum it up, mitb owe’s me roughly 30k of 2006 RS GP, with inflation, etc, thats roughly 1 Million gold that I am owed.[/quote]
I remember it froze with the movable camera option often… also, mitb had removed chat filters!

Read full topic

item.description:

Moparisthebest:

I haven’t seen a pking client since the days of MoparScape Revolution. What kind of features would you like to see in one?

Ahh does were the days…

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Pretty sure that the team capes have the best cape bonuses out of the f2p capes anyway.

item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

skill capes dont exist in f2p, what people do is equip them in p2p then logon to f2p, obviously the bonus’s are not transfered

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @MujaheD Radeon
item.description:
@MujaheD wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:14, topic:301865”][quote author=MujaheD link=topic=398193.msg2955980#msg2955980 date=1252836002]
The reason I suggested automatic weapon switching, is because sometimes if the player you’re fighting is a higher level than you, you have to right click them and click attack. Quite often there are other players in the way as well, making it even harder to successfully switch weapon and attack your opponent. Timing also plays a big role.

[/quote]
Wear a team cape and you can left click anybody (so long as the target isn’t wearing an identical cape). No more excuses. :p[/quote]

Haha all that time… No wonder I had people calling me a noob for my normal cape.
Omg…

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

MujaheD:

The reason I suggested automatic weapon switching, is because sometimes if the player you’re fighting is a higher level than you, you have to right click them and click attack. Quite often there are other players in the way as well, making it even harder to successfully switch weapon and attack your opponent. Timing also plays a big role.

Wear a team cape and you can left click anybody (so long as the target isn’t wearing an identical cape). No more excuses.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:301865”]The client could look up high scores for the max hp and then give you a point value based on that, if you wanted to waste the extra bandwidth. (don’t people complain that bandwidth affects fighting or some bullshit like that?)

The max hit idea would be neat too. Maybe I will make a pking client soonish.[/quote]
The lite high score page is essentially a string of numbers separated by white spaces. Shouldn’t be any kind of issue at all.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @haticks haticks
item.description:
@haticks wrote:

You can predict your next hit by looking at how much your xp goes up, sense it goes up before the hit is actually displayed. That could give you a second or two more to decide if you want to switch or not. You could also use this too add up damage delt and then compare it with the high scores hp lvl. Giving you a somewhat more accurate guess.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

The client could look up high scores for the max hp and then give you a point value based on that, if you wanted to waste the extra bandwidth. (don’t people complain that bandwidth affects fighting or some bullshit like that?)

The max hit idea would be neat too. Maybe I will make a pking client soonish.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Obviously 0 would be red-barred (dead, or extremely low hp) and 255 would be a full bar, right?

So if the client preformed a high score lookup using Jagex’s lite high score page then it could make the correlation between that byte sent by the server and the player’s actual hp.
Taking this into account, and your strength level, perhaps it could give you advice when to switch (without actually switching for you).

Other interesting features that I spoke about with frank once were things such as having the client tell you the maximum hit of the target player, based on their visible gear (which is all you need to worry about on f2p because there aren’t any rings that give strength bonus).

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Ollie:

what may be useful is painting over the minimap with the colours for attackable players.

I used to have that built into moparscape too.

Anyway, thanks for confirming the HP thing, that is what I thought.

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

hp is not available anymore, only on a scale of 0 -> 0xFF dependent on how much health needs to be drawn on the health bar above their head
what may be useful is painting over the minimap with the colours for attackable players.

i can only see the fast weapon switch being a pain and interrupting you whilst you play

Read full topic

item.title: PvP client?
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

[quote=“MujaheD, post:5, topic:301865”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=398193.msg2955304#msg2955304 date=1252792604]
I haven’t seen a pking client since the days of MoparScape Revolution. What kind of features would you like to see in one?
[/quote]

Well I was mostly hoping for something that can quickly switch weapons and attack the same opponent again. But coming to think of it, I remember some older clients having the ability to read other players’ hp and I think it was your client which allowed you to move the camera without moving the player?[/quote]

Yes, mine allowed you to do all of those things, is that actually still helpful in PVP? I’m not entirely sure that other player’s HP is still available to your client anymore, but the other things should be possible.

Read full topic
